Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.physics.component

Class ColliderComponent

java.lang.Object
technology.sola.engine.physics.component.ColliderComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
technology.sola.ecs.Component
public class ColliderComponent extends Object implements technology.sola.ecs.Component
ColliderComponent is a Component that contains collision data for an Entity. The currently supported collider types are:
  • ColliderComponent.ColliderType.AABB
  • ColliderComponent.ColliderType.CIRCLE

    • aabb

      public static ColliderComponent aabb(float width, float height)
      Creates a rectangle ColliderComponent with defined width and height.
      Parameters:
      width - the width of the collision box
      height - the height of the collision box
      Returns:
      a rectangle ColliderComponent

    • aabb

      public static ColliderComponent aabb(float offsetX, float offsetY, float width, float height)
      Creates a rectangle ColliderComponent with defined width and height. Its top, left coordinate is offset from the top, left coordinate of the Transform.
      Parameters:
      offsetX - the x coordinate offset
      offsetY - the y coordinate offset
      width - the width of the collision box
      height - the height of the collision box
      Returns:
      a rectangle ColliderComponent

    • circle

      Returns:

    • circle

      public static ColliderComponent circle(float offsetX, float offsetY, float radius)
      Creates a circle ColliderComponent with defined radius. Its top, left coordinate is offset from the top, left coordinate of the Transform.
      Parameters:
      offsetX - the x coordinate offset
      offsetY - the y coordinate offset
      radius - the radius of the collider
      Returns:
      a circle ColliderComponent

    • isSensor

      public boolean isSensor()
      A collider that is a sensor will not respond to collision resolution but will emit collision events if an Entity with a DynamicBodyComponent collides.
      Returns:
      true if this collider is a sensor
